Package ohos.telephony

Interface ISendShortMessageCallback


  • public interface ISendShortMessageCallback
    Provides a callback to be invoked when an SMS message is sent.
    Since:
    4

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int SEND_SMS_FAILURE_RADIO_OFF
      Indicates that sending the SMS fails because the modem is powered off.
      static int SEND_SMS_FAILURE_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
      Indicates that sending the SMS message fails because the network is unavailable or does not support sending or reception of SMS messages.
      static int SEND_SMS_FAILURE_UNKNOWN
      Indicates that sending the SMS message fails due to an unknown reason.
      static int SEND_SMS_SUCCESS
      Indicates that the SMS message is successfully sent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void sendShortMessageResult​(int result, String uri, boolean isLastPart)
      Called when an SMS message is sent.

    • Field Detail

      • SEND_SMS_FAILURE_RADIO_OFF

        static final int SEND_SMS_FAILURE_RADIO_OFF
        Indicates that sending the SMS fails because the modem is powered off.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEND_SMS_FAILURE_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE

        static final int SEND_SMS_FAILURE_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
        Indicates that sending the SMS message fails because the network is unavailable or does not support sending or reception of SMS messages.
        See Also:

        static final int SEND_SMS_FAILURE_UNKNOWN
        Indicates that sending the SMS message fails due to an unknown reason.

        static final int SEND_SMS_SUCCESS
        Indicates that the SMS message is successfully sent.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • sendShortMessageResult

        void sendShortMessageResult​(int result,
                            String uri,
                            boolean isLastPart)
        Called when an SMS message is sent.
        Parameters:
        result - Indicates the SMS message sending result.
        uri - Indicates the URI to store the sent SMS message.
        isLastPart - Specifies whether this is the last part of a multi-part SMS message. The value true means that this is the last part of the multi-part SMS message, and false means the opposite.
        Since:
        4
